titles: Loues metamorphosis A vvittie and courtly pastorall, vvritten by Mr. Iohn Lyllie. First playd by the Children of Paules, and now by the Children of the Chappel.
author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.
publisher: Printed [by S. Stafford] for William Wood, dwelling at the west end of Paules, at the signe of Time,
notes: The last leaf bears a printer's mark.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
